meanings.definition: Wasting time or money on unnecessary or unproductive activities.
meanings.sent1: The boondoggling project delayed the team's progress.
meanings.sent2: She felt frustrated by the boondoggling paperwork at the office.
meanings.sent3: The boondoggling meeting seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent4: The boondoggling tasks piled up like a mountain of wasted time.
meanings.sent5: The boondoggling behavior drained the company's resources.

meanings.definition: Engaging in trivial or pointless work.
meanings.sent1: His boondoggling efforts resulted in no real progress.
meanings.sent2: The team was tired of the boondoggling assignments.
meanings.sent3: The boondoggling task felt like a silly game.
meanings.sent4: She saw through his boondoggling excuses.
meanings.sent5: The boondoggling work left everyone feeling unaccomplished.

meanings.definition: A project or task that is considered a waste of time or resources.
meanings.sent1: The new initiative turned out to be a boondoggling.
meanings.sent2: They realized the entire project was just a boondoggling.
meanings.sent3: The boondoggling assignment made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The project became a boondoggling black hole.
meanings.sent5: The team's effort turned into a boondoggling nightmare.
